issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Replace use of Priority in the Scheduling infrastructure with an opaque ShedulerRequestKey

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.resource.Priority is no longer used after YARN-5392. It can be deprecated or removed.

comments.body:
Hi [~sunilg]
I think its not a public API so i think we can go ahead and delete it, And i think we can reduce the priority of the jira :)
Attaching patch. We could remove this file as its  no longer used.
